questions.question: What is the main problem Feature Stores solve?
options: Training-Serving Skew — ensuring consistent features between training and inference
questions.explanation: Feature stores provide a single source of truth for features, ensuring the exact same transformations are used during training and real-time serving.

questions.question: DVC (Data Version Control) allows you to version control large datasets similar to how Git versions code.
questions.explanation: DVC tracks large files, datasets, and model artifacts alongside your Git repository without storing them directly in Git.

questions.question: CI/CD for ML models differs from traditional CI/CD because:
options: It must validate data quality, model performance, and behavioral tests — not just code correctness
questions.explanation: ML CI/CD includes data validation, model evaluation metrics, bias checks, and regression tests beyond standard code testing.
